expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Mode C: Convert based on 'convert' keyword with source=claude target=gemini
Agent loads both Claude and Gemini playbook sections from references/model-playbooks.md
Agent builds a conversion plan identifying direct mappings, adaptations, removals, and new features
Agent executes conversion showing source pattern, target pattern, and rationale for each change
Agent runs Mode B (Analyze) report-only on converted prompt to catch conversion issues
Agent recommends Mode D (Evaluate) using same test cases on both models
